comment.text: This translation key is used for "Show links to Help Center", which appears on a checkbox button in the UI. It should be translated to provide users with information about accessing help resources when the checkbox is enabled.

usage.context: setHelpEnabled(!helpEnabled)} />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Links zum Hilfe-Center anzeigen' is not the most natural-sounding way to say 'Show links to Help Center' in German. 'Anzeigen' is grammatically correct, but 'zeigen' would be more common and idiomatic in this context.
The translation "Ցույց տալ հղումներ «Օգնության կենտրոն»" is a literal translation and doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Show links to Help Center'.  It's acceptable but could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation like "Ցուցադրել օգնության կենտրոնի հղումներ" or "Ցուցադրել կենտրոն օգնության հղումներ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Afişare linkul către Centru de ajutor' is too literal. 'Show links to Help Center' implies displaying multiple links, while the translation implies a single link. A better translation would convey the plural nature of 'links'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Afișează linkuri către Centrul de ajutor

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "උදව් මධ්‍යස්ථානය වෙත ඇති සම්බන්ධතා පෙන්වන්න" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Show links to Help Center' in a natural Sinhala way. It translates to something like 'Show the connections that are in the Help Center'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be "උදව් මධ්‍යස්ථානය සඳහා සබැඳි පෙන්වන්න" (Udawu Madhyasthanaya saha bandhaka penwanna) which translates to 'Show links to the Help Center'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Прикажи линкове ка Центру за помоћ" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Show links to Help Center." The preposition 'ка' doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'to'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Прикажи линкове до Центра за помоћ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translated text uses a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters. While Cyrillic allows for either, consistency is preferred. Ideally, 'Центру за помоћ' should be consistently cased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Прикажи линкове до Центра за помоћ
